newsitem.title: USA: BHC Financial holders OK Fiserv deal.
newsitem.headline: BHC Financial holders OK Fiserv deal.

text.p: BHC Financial Inc said Friday its stockholders approved a transaction in which the company will be acquired by Fiserv Inc.
BHC said its shareholders will receive shares in Fiserv common stock under an exchange ratio determined by the average of the closing price of Fiserv stock for the last 20 trading days ending May 28.
Fiserv was trading at 38-3/4, unchanged on the day.
The merger will be accounted for as a pooling of interests and is expected to close on May 30, BHC said.

Fiserv, which is based here, is an independent provider of financial data processing systems and related information management services and products to more than 5,000 banks, credit unions, mortgage and savings institutions worldwide.
BHC, through its unit BHC Securities Inc, provides support services to securities brokerage affiliates of banks and other financial institutions.
